Posts.Content: maa70 wrote: Hi everyone Thank you for taking the time to read this! I am awaiting gallbladder surgery and recently had an abdo MRI. Seems that this showed up 2 lumps in my left breast! My gallbladder surgeon said there was nothing to suggest that these were anything but benign cysts but that it was protocol to send me for an ultrasound to confirm what they suspect. He even wrote 'benign cyst?' on the ultrasound referral form. I have private medical insurance so I was able to get a super quick scan which will be done tomorrow lunchtime. The guy doing it is a breast specialist. I cannot however get myself away from thinking the worst and that they are suspecting cancer but just didn't want to worry me. Would they have written and said benign cyst if they suspected it was more sinister??? I am sorry to be such a baby but I am in a terrible state of panic about all of this as I was not expecting this at all. I cannot feel any lumps and I have no other typical signs of breast cancer!! Any advice/support would be greatly appreciated. Maa xx Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Freaking Out!!! maa70 chrissyb

Posts.Content: Nov 7, 2013 12:27PM maa70 wrote: Thank you all so much for replying, I am so grateful for the re-assurance :) I feel a bit calmer now, think it was just such a shock as I went to get the MRI results for the gallbladder/liver etc and then he came out with the breast lumps stuff...my mind has been going overboard! Maa xxxx
Posts.Title: Freaking Out!!! maa70 chrissyb

Posts.Content: Nov 8, 2013 08:09AM maa70 wrote: Hi to all you special people who came to my aid yesterday :) I wanted to come back and let you all know that my ultrasound was clear!!!! I had 2 enormous fluid filled cysts which the specialist drained there and then!! No cancer!!! I cannot thank you all enough for being here for people like me. You are so special. Maa xxxxxooooo
Posts.Title: Freaking Out!!! maa70 chrissyb
